website_summaries.verdict: A lot of buyers were satisfied and happy with the Under Armour Charged Rogue's lightweight construction, fit and comfort. Aside from its structure, they loved how supportive and breathable the shoe is. Although some of them have issues on the sizing and durability, overall, the Under Armour Charged Rogue was accepted by a lot of consumers. This shoe is a good option for those who are looking for an affordable yet dependable running partner.
pros: Some of the buyers said that the Under Armour Charged Rogue has a perfect fit
Its lightweight structure was admired by many purchasers
According to those who have bought it, the shoe is comfortable
Based on several reviews, the footwear is supportive
The shoe is also reliable for gym and treadmill activities, noted by some consumers
The Under Armour Charged Rogue is a good-looking shoe according to several testers
The majority of the users loved the breathable coverage of the upper
A good number of reviewers noted its excellent cushioning
The shoe's affordable price is lauded by a lot of wearers
cons: The Under Armour Charged Rogue runs small according to some testers
According to some testers, the netting of the Under Armour Charged Rogue ripped off easily after several uses only

customer_reviews.title: Great value Trainers
customer_reviews.text: I go through lots of trainers due to heavy sole wear but these seem to be holding up at the moment and they are really comfortable
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS FOSTER

customer_reviews.title: Excellent run for the price
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable, light,soft well molded. Excellent run for the price you pay...
customer_reviews.author: JML Buss

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for walking and running.
customer_reviews.text: There is enough gel support that make it very comfortable to walk and run. The design is a classic look.
customer_reviews.author: Zulu

customer_reviews.title: Smart, Comfortable and Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and he hasnt had them off his feet. Good value and very happy. Perfect for gym use.
customer_reviews.author: RabBailie

customer_reviews.title: Great price, comfort, and look
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value, extremely comfortable. I'm a size UK13/EU48.5, it's extremely difficult for me to find good quality, nice looking, reasonably priced shoes but under armour absolutely nailed it. Best trainers I've had in a long time for a lot less than I'm used to paying.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Lockeyssøn

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, good cushioning for running. Look good too. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Badger2007

customer_reviews.title: Good Value, comfortable trainers
customer_reviews.text: Good delivery service. Trainers are excellent, fit well are very light and comfortable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Puente Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Fab
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing shoes,love them !!! Very comfy,very nice,fits perfectly !!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Shocking
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed never had a pair of running shoes that cut the backs of my heals. Would never buy under armour again
customer_reviews.author: pasqualino tucciarone

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, very light. The soles are so soft, best shoe I ever bought
customer_reviews.author: Steve Gilbert

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Charged Rogue Running Shoes
feature_bullets: NEUTRAL: for those looking for the right balance between flexibility, cushioning and versatility
The upper in structured mesh, extremely light and breathable, provides support at strategic points
The slight external buttress provides more support and stability to the back of the foot
The Charged Cushioning system uses compression melded foam for even greater responsiveness and durability
The comfortable removable midsole ensures a comfortable and responsive stride
